name: Kaiju City Builder
description:
(Download Windows exe for better graphics and performance)

Rampage-Godzilla-like/City Builder created for LudumDare41

Kaiju City is in a bad bad place, too much people, not enough resources, pollution everywhere…

Everything goes wrong in this town. But all hope is not lost.

For Kaiju City got a spirit protector of nature, a big one.

How To Play

To manage the city, destroy buildings!

Choose the districts you destroy, a different district will be rebuilt.

Max the Environment gauge to save Kaiju City.

Joystick

Move : Left Stick

Move Camera: Right Stick

Attack : Right Trigger

Keyboard/Mouse

Move : ZQSD/WASD

Move Camera : Mouse

Attack : E
